|cpu1_cores = 1 |cpu1_type = MIPS64 |cpu1_type_rev = OCTEON Plus |cpu1spd = 300 |is_doc = |bus = |flash1type = |fla1_num = |fla1chip = Intel;JS28F256-P33BF; |flash1size = 32 |flash1maxsize = |ram1type = |ram1type1 = |ram1spd = |ram1size = 128 |ram1chip = Samsung;K4T51163QJ-BCE7; |ram1_num = 2 |nvramsize = |eth_cpu = true |sw1chip = Realtek;RTL8309G; |wan_ports = 2 |wan_speed = |lan_ports = 4 |lan_speed = 100MbE |ethstandard = |portbasedvlan = |802.1qvlan = |auto_mdix = |sup_jumbo = |ethoui = F0:F7:55 |bootwait = |stockbootloader = |stockos = |exp_if_types = |exp_sim_num = |exp_pcmcia_num = |exp_expcard_num = |exp_minipci_num = |exp_minipcie_num = |exp_usb_num = |exp_cf_num = |exp_sdmmc_num = |exp_ide_num = |exp_ata_num = |exp_sata_num = |exp_esata_num = |exp_parallel = |exp_sfp_num = |exp_M.2 = |usb_hub = |pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 12 |pwr_amp_dc = 1 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = |pwr_barrel_inner = |pwr_barrel_len = |pwr_pol = |serial = yes |jtag = yes |specialfeat = |flags = |addchip = FPGA;Lattice;LCMXO256;Lattice, MachXO, LCMXO256C, 3TN100C;1;,,, 2A, 18V Synchronous Rectified Step-Down Converter;MPS;MP1482DS;;3; |802dot11_protocols = none |defaulip = 192.168.1.1 |defaultlogin = admin |defaultpass = admin |manuf = |manuf_model = |manuf_rev = |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = |availability = |eoldate = |fccapprovdate = |estreldate = |estprice = |upc = |ean = |dx_sku = |newegg = |asin = B0002I7288 |asin_country = |asin2 = |asin_country2 = |countrymanuf = Taiwan |buttons = |led = |dimensions = |weight = }}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== "3000-RV4241G90 Manufactured for CISCO" is silk-screened on the board. ==Links of Interest== ===Teardown=== *[https://www.natthapol89.com/2014/10/cisco-rv042-v3.html ''Cisco RV042 v3'' Teardown on '''Natthapol89'''] ===Reviews=== *[http://www.smallnetbuilder.com/lanwan/lanwan-reviews/31502-cisco-rv042-v3-dual-wan-vpn-router-reviewed ''Cisco RV042 v3 Dual WAN VPN Router Reviewed'' on '''SmallNetBuilder'''] :Cisco RV042 v3 is powered by a @300MHz [[Cavium]] CN5010, :replacing the Intel IXP425-266 in the [[Cisco RV042]] V1. :RAM and flash have been bumped up to 128 MB and 32 MB, respectively, :up from 32 MB and 8 MB in the original [[Cisco RV042 (Linksys)]]. *[http://www.smallnetbuilder.com/lanwan/lanwan-reviews/31525-cisco-rv082-and-rv016-v3-vpn-routers-reviewed ''Cisco RV082 and RV016 v3 VPN Routers Reviewed'' on '''SmallNetBuilder'''] :Like the RV042, the original 016 and 082 used an Intel IXP425-266 :processor with 16 MB of flash and 64 and 32 MB of RAM, respectively 
Model	   CPU	  Freq.  Flash 	RAM 	Switch
Cisco     Cavium   MHz   (MB)   (MB)    Realtek

RV016 v3  CN5020   300	  32	256	RTL8329M
RV042 v3  CN5010   300	  32	128	RTL8309G
RV082 v3  CN5020   300	  32	256	RTL8309G, RTL8306SD
